result.cont_job_exp:
Design Manager
July 2004 - May 2006 (1 year 11 months)
Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of
global design.
Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative
application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing
strategy and material R&D as well.
Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas
such as renewable energy house, high-speed train,  electric vehicle,  mobile
computing etc.
Senior Design Consultant
July 2002 - July 2004 (2 years 1 month)
Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint
venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time.
Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics,
and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in
Greater China and SEA .
Midea
lead designer / design manager
August 1997 - March 2002 (4 years 8 months)
As the pioneer of in-house industrial designer in China,  providing product
design service to Midea and other benefit-conflict free external clients.  Beside
using the very old school design techniques of hand sketching, hand rendering
and hand made prototypes, we were the pioneers of adopting contemporary
design techniques, such 2D rendering, 3D modeling and 3D printing back then.
As the major driver, to help import user-centric approach into design process,
including adoption  of  user research and UX/UI design  .

Contact
leo.liu@originplus.com
www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-
%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406
(LinkedIn)
www.originplus.com (Company)
Top Skills
Product Innovation
Product Strategy
Concept Development
刘方Liu Fang
创始人&CEO@本然创新 I Clash the FutureI#产品策略 #创新工具 #
批判性思考 #宜居 # 出行
Putuo District
Summary
着迷于从0到1的探索历程;坚信产品是绝对的商业硬核,产品不到
位,任何商业模式的创新都是虚妄。
早年和乡镇企业家挖空心思”多快好省“,后来在欧美500强与多国精英
探讨全球创新策略,现在为企业提供产品创新服务。产业经验横跨消
费品与工业品,实体产品与无形体验;岗位经验覆盖从策略到执行的
创新全链路。
推崇批判性思考,同时开发创新工具,努力降低普及门槛,压缩创新
链条。
Experience
ORIGIN+
Founder & CEO
July 2009 - Present (11 years 2 months)
shanghai
本然创新成立于2009年,是中国产品创新咨询服务的先行者。我们致力于帮助
企业发现和定义新产品的机会,概念与策略。 我们的客户是来自不同而领域的
领导企业,耳熟能详的名字包括科勒,索尼,三星,OPPO,魅族,联想,广汽丰田,广汽传祺,长安汽车,博士西门子,惠而浦,苏泊尔,方太,老板,美
的,长虹,奥克斯,阿克苏诺贝尔,罗莱家纺,迪卡侬,奥的斯,3M,通力等。
Established in 2009, ORIGIN+ is the pioneer of product innovation consulting
firm in China. We are dedicated in helping business discover and define
the opportunity, concept and strategy for new product. Our clients consist
of leaders from various industries, including those well-known names :
Kohler,Sony,Samsung,  OPPO, Meizu,Lenovo,TOYOTA, GuangZhou Auto,
ChangAn Auto, BSH, Whirlpool, Supor,Fotile,Robam,Midea,Changhong,Aux,
AkzonNobel,LuoLai,Decathlon, Otis,3M,KONE etc.
BP
Director Of Product Development
May 2008 - May 2009 (1 year 1 month)
Shanghai, China

head of new product development, to develop  a biomass energy solution to
help consumer in rural area in emerging country have a cleaner, safer and
more affordable living in kitchen.
GE Healthcare
6 years
Design Director
May 2006 - June 2008 (2 years 2 months)
Shanghai, China
Establishing China studio of global design from scratch,  covering the region of
greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities
in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service
design.
Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( inChina for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of
product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process.
Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and
product organization.
Design Manager
July 2004 - May 2006 (1 year 11 months)
Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of
global design.
Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative
application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing
strategy and material R&D as well.
Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas
such as renewable energy house, high-speed train,  electric vehicle,  mobile
computing etc.
Senior Design Consultant
July 2002 - July 2004 (2 years 1 month)
Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint
venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time.
Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics,
and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in
Greater China and SEA .
Midea
lead designer / design manager
August 1997 - March 2002 (4 years 8 months)
As the pioneer of in-house industrial designer in China,  providing product

using the very old school design techniques of hand sketching, hand rendering
and hand made prototypes, we were the pioneers of adopting contemporary
design techniques, such 2D rendering, 3D modeling and 3D printing back then.
As the major driver, to help import user-centric approach into design process,
including adoption  of  user research and UX/UI design  .
Education
Jiangnan University
master of engineering of design, Industrial and Product Design · (2004 - 2007)
Jiangnan University
Bachelor of Arts - BA, Industrial and Product Design · (1993 - 1993)
